mapper.insert: insert into bbs (b_no, b_sabun, b_name, b_title, b_cnt, b_content, b_phone, b_pwd, b_wdate, b_juso1, b_juso2, b_email, b_url, b_file1, b_size1) values(bbs_seq.nextval, #{b_sabun}, #{b_name}, #{b_title}, 0, #{b_content}, #{b_phone}, #{b_pwd}, sysdate, #{b_juso1}, #{b_juso2}, #{b_email}, #{b_url}, #{b_file1}, #{b_size1} )
mapper.select: select rownum rn, b.* from bbs b order by rn

select count(*) cnt from bbs
where b_name like '%'||#{sval}||'%'
where b_title like '%'||#{sval}||'%'
where b_content like '%'||#{sval}||'%'
mapper.update: update bbs set b_name = #{b_name}, b_title = #{b_title}, b_content = #{b_content}, b_phone = #{b_phone}, b_pwd = #{b_pwd}, b_wdate = sysdate, b_juso1 = #{b_juso1}, b_juso2 = #{b_juso2}, b_email = #{b_email}, b_url = #{b_url}, b_file1 = #{b_file1}, b_size1 = #{b_size1} where b_sabun = #{b_sabun}
update bbs set b_cnt = b_cnt+1 where b_sabun = #{b_sabun}
